Question & Options:

Options:
A. A. Adrenaline is administered to Maggie in a critical moment.
B. B. Maggie survives after receiving the injection of adrenaline.
C. C. The injection of adrenaline is fatal for Maggie.
D. D. Maggie is a boxer who faces life-threatening challenges.
